entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unwanted Top and Bottom Spacing in .NET MAUI iOS Simulator #26080
  • CurrentCulture region not read correctly from device (iOS 18.0) #26079
  • WebAuthenticator relogin without showing loging dialog from OAuth Provider #26078
  • [XAML/IntelliSense] IntelliSense support for Bindings in XAML #26077
  • [XAML] Compile Errors for invalid references in XAML #26076
  • Deploy option not available in net9 maui demo on Win 11 #26075
  • Running an Android app with R8 shrinking results in Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: FragmentManager has not been attached to a host. #26074

Closed

  • Decimal point on numeric keyboard not working since Net8.0 #19655
  • FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory returns different path after updating to latest version #25981
    .NET 9 SR2

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    community ✨

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26073
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.1 to 1.6.3 #25977
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix #26039
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2

Updated

  • Fix grid not getting invalidated when changing the Height/Width of Row/ColumnDefinitions declared with the short syntax #26046
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Fall back to loading .NET 8 date strings #26033
    area-essentials, .NET 9 SR2
  • Changing shape background color with dataTrigger #25544
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed Using safe area causes white area at the top upon entry focus #26063
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26071
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Updated the Blazor Hybrid Solution template to work better with the dotnet cli or IDEs that rely on it. #25997
    area-blazor, area-templates, community ✨
  • Always propagate the BC to the ControlTemplate #26072
    .NET 9 SR2
